mapper.select:
SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT SEMSTR_NO ,STU_ID ,AWARD_CD ,SHAP_RCPT_DATE ,SHAP_CHC_DATE ,PROFE_ID ,SHAP_ACC_CD ,SHAP_NO_REASON ,SHAP_DOC_NO ,ATCH_FILE_ID ,SHAP_RECOMMEND
FROM SCHOLARSHIP_APPLICATION ORDER BY SHAP_DOC_NO DESC ) A

SELECT SA.SEMSTR_NO ,SA.STU_ID ,P.NM AS STU_NM ,P.BRDT AS STU_BRDT ,P.RDNMADR AS STU_RDNMADR ,P.ZIP AS STU_ZIP ,P.DADDR AS STU_DADDR ,P.MBTLNUM AS STU_MBTLNUM ,P.EML AS STU_EML ,CASE P.SEXDSTN_CD WHEN 'M' THEN '남' WHEN 'W' THEN '여' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS STU_SEXDSTNCD ,SA.AWARD_CD ,A.AWARD_NM AS AWARD_NM ,SA.SHAP_RCPT_DATE ,SA.SHAP_CHC_DATE ,SA.PROFE_ID ,SA.SHAP_RECOMMEND ,C.COCO_STTS AS COCO_STTS ,SA.SHAP_NO_REASON ,SA.SHAP_DOC_NO ,SA.ATCH_FILE_ID
FROM SCHOLARSHIP_APPLICATION SA INNER JOIN PERSON P ON (SA.STU_ID = P.ID) INNER JOIN AWARD A ON (SA.AWARD_CD = A.AWARD_CD) INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON(SA.SHAP_ACC_CD = C.COCO_CD) WHERE SHAP_DOC_NO = #{shapDocNo, jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT
SA.SEMSTR_NO ,SA.AWARD_CD ,A.AWARD_NM AS AWARD_NM ,SHAP_RCPT_DATE ,SHAP_CHC_DATE ,C.COCO_STTS AS COCO_STTS ,SHAP_NO_REASON ,SHAP_DOC_NO ,ATCH_FILE_ID
FROM SCHOLARSHIP_APPLICATION SA INNER JOIN AWARD A ON (SA.AWARD_CD = A.AWARD_CD) INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON(SA.SHAP_ACC_CD = C.COCO_CD)
WHERE STU_ID = #{stuId, jdbcType= VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SCHOLARSHIP_APPLICATION WHERE SHAP_DOC_NO = #{shapDocNo, jdbcType= VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHOLARSHIP_APPLICATION SET SHAP_ACC_CD = #{cocoStts}, SHAP_NO_REASON = CASE WHEN #{cocoStts} = 'A04' THEN #{shapNoReason, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ELSE NULL END, SHAP_CHC_DATE = CASE WHEN #{cocoStts} IN ('A03', 'A04') THEN SYSDATE ELSE NULL END WHERE SHAP_DOC_NO = #{shapDocNo}
